variables.description: The threshold below which the instances are scaled down (stopped). If the load                   falls below this threshold for a specified amount of time, AWS OpsWorks stops a specified                   number of instances.
variables.name: DownScaling

variables.description: Whether to enable automatic load-based scaling for the layer.
variables.name: Enable

variables.description: The threshold above which the instances are scaled up (added). If the load                   exceeds this thresholds for a specified amount of time, AWS OpsWorks starts a specified                   number of instances.
variables.name: UpScaling
